From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
To: Lali Das <Lali.Das@chalhoub.com>

Date: 2024-11-27 15:52
Subject: Re: Cyber security
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Patrick,
I hope you are doing well.
Below is the update on the progress towards the Group's cybersecurity insurance procurement initiative:

1.	
	Broker Appointment: We have engaged Marsh and Nasco as our brokers. Each broker has been appointed as Broker of Record (BOR) with exclusive access rights to different markets. This approach ensures comprehensive market engagement without overlap facilitating a fair and competitive process.
2.	
	Risk Profiling: An exhaustive risk profiling has been completed in coordination with the Chalhoub Cybersecurity team and shared with both brokers. This detailed analysis enables accurate risk assessment for a well-informed proposal and pricing.
3.	
	Coverage Target: We are aiming for a policy with a coverage limit of USD 10 million, covering all Chalhoub-managed companies with more than 50% ownership by Chalhoub Group Limited.
4.	
	Market Interest: Interest from insurers has been moderate. While some have shown interest, they are still evaluating the details provided. We are addressing any additional clarifications requested by insurers to facilitate their assessments.
5.	
	Proposal Timeline: Both brokers are expected to submit their initial proposals by December 10, 2024. After a thorough review, we will request any necessary adjustments before proceeding with a best and final offer process.
6.	
	Next Steps: The final selection will be based on the overall value proposition and cost-effectiveness.
7.	
	Implementation Goal: Our objective is to have the policy in place by mid-January 2025.

I hope this provides the necessary clarity on the progress made so far and remain at your disposal for any further information or clarification required.
Thank You & Best Regards,
Hagop
HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

Subject: Re: Cyber security

 

Dear Patrick,

I hope you are doing well.

Below is the update on the progress towards the Group's cybersecurity insurance procurement initiative:

1.	Broker Appointment: We have engaged Marsh and Nasco as our brokers. Each broker has been appointed as Broker of Record (BOR) with exclusive access rights to different markets. This approach ensures comprehensive market engagement without overlap facilitating a fair and competitive process.

2.	Risk Profiling: An exhaustive risk profiling has been completed in coordination with the Chalhoub Cybersecurity team and shared with both brokers. This detailed analysis enables accurate risk assessment for a well-informed proposal and pricing.

2.	Risk Profiling: An exhaustive risk profiling has been completed in coordination with the Chalhoub Cybersecurity team and shared with both brokers. This detailed analysis enables accurate risk assessment for a well-informed proposal and pricing.

3.	Coverage Target: We are aiming for a policy with a coverage limit of USD 10 million, covering all Chalhoub-managed companies with more than 50% ownership by Chalhoub Group Limited.

4.	Market Interest: Interest from insurers has been moderate. While some have shown interest, they are still evaluating the details provided. We are addressing any additional clarifications requested by insurers to facilitate their assessments.

5.	Proposal Timeline: Both brokers are expected to submit their initial proposals by December 10, 2024. After a thorough review, we will request any necessary adjustments before proceeding with a best and final offer process.

6.	Next Steps: The final selection will be based on the overall value proposition and cost-effectiveness.

7.	Implementation Goal: Our objective is to have the policy in place by mid-January 2025.

I hope this provides the necessary clarity on the progress made so far and remain at your disposal for any further information or clarification required.

Thank You & Best Regards,
Hagop
